TopicTitle: Ask the Mods questions about the Forums!

Articles.Content:
Why do profile pics/avatars and other things like banners seem to frequently show as blue boxes with ? in them? Im on mobile (iphone xr ios17) 99.9% of the time. Fwiw i dont recall the forums ever being this glitchy when they were vbulletin. The great purge of those days not withstanding ofc. Just wondering is all.

112301192024

new page lol

**Edited <time datetime="2024-01-19T17:23:45Z" title="01/19/2024 05:23  PM" data-short="Jan 19">January 19</time> by AlamoVampire**

> 
> 
> 7 minutes ago, AlamoVampire said:
> 
> 
> Why do profile pics/avatars and other things like banners seem to frequently show as blue boxes with ? in them?
> 

I think that usually means the link to those images is no longer functioning correctly.  For example, the link is broken.
I have not seen this happen. Is it a mobile only issue?

I've also never seen it happen.

Since the avatars and banners are hosted by an Amazon cdn, the blame will either rest with them or a DNS resolution issue on your end.

Ive only seen it on mobile that i can currently recall but in fairness im typically on mobile 99.9% of the time because im too lazy to go to my computer some 30 feet from me. If i see it on pc ill let you guys know.

182801192024
Can you give an example I can click on to see if I get the same thing?

[@Deddly](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/profile/62955-deddly/) sadly i dont think i can. I honestly wouldnt even know how to if it were given im seeing it on mobile.   

105401202024

It did it again…  i tried posting AND editing from my pc but “were prepping the launch site” then couldnt edit because it said i couldnt then i got the launch site thing when i tried to dm the pics.

**Edited <time datetime="2024-01-22T16:08:24Z" title="01/22/2024 04:08  PM" data-short="Jan 22">January 22</time> by AlamoVampire**
Well that's odd. I have never seen that myself but I wonder if it might be network related .

As I think I posted last year, I started making custom mugs using a sublimation printer and a Cricut mug press. Is it okay if I do a little market research / design feedback on these forums? Not to sell on these forums, of course, I'm sure it's not allowed here and besides, shipping is expensive so I only intend to sell locally at markets or Marketplace. I just want feedback on designs, whether people would consider buying them if they saw them for sale somewhere or suggestions for improvement, and naturally I would limit it to one thread for that purpose. 

[@Dakota](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/profile/225122-dakota/), Deddly is suggesting I should ask a Community Manager. So can I, please huh huh pleeeease?

**Edited <time datetime="2024-01-26T15:13:10Z" title="01/26/2024 03:13  PM" data-short="Jan 26">January 26</time> by StrandedonEarth**

> 
> 
> 5 hours ago, StrandedonEarth said:
> 
> 
> As I think I posted last year, I started making custom mugs using a sublimation printer and a Cricut mug press. Is it okay if I do a little market research / design feedback on these forums? Not to sell on these forums, of course, I'm sure it's not allowed here and besides, shipping is expensive so I only intend to sell locally at markets or Marketplace. I just want feedback on designs, whether people would consider buying them if they for sale somewhere or suggestions for improvement, and naturally I would limit it to one thread for that purpose. 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> So can I, please huh huh pleeeease?
> 

That's a good question. As forum moderators, we don't make decisions like that. I believe the only way to get permission would be to approach a community manager and get official approval. If I am mistaken, I'm sure one of my fellow moderators will correct me ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

Hey, is there a way to disable DMs from users I’m not following?

**Edited <time datetime="2024-02-03T08:14:41Z" title="02/03/2024 08:14  AM" data-short="Feb 3">February 3</time> by Periple**

How do I get bell notifications for threads I follow? I don’t want email notifications. I just want the bell icon at the top  to let me know a thread I follow has a new reply even if that reply doesn’t quote me or like anything I’ve said.

Strange.

Hi, I was wondering what you usually do when moderating?

> 
> 
> 15 hours ago, kspbutitscursed said:
> 
> 
> Hi, I was wondering what you usually do when moderating?
> 

Read reports, discuss how to deal with them, then respond if called for, and poke around the forum looking for problems which haven't been reported. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

>

> 

keep up the good work
